AddParameterBlock.description: here are all the Parameter blocks definitions, they can be used in the machine specs.json file to define cycles.

ForProgramBlock.description: **For Loop** Runs blocks util *limit* is reached.

IfProgramBlock.description: **If Statement** Runs *true_blocks* if *[0]* compared to *[2]* by *[1]* is true otherwise runs *false_blocks*.

$schema.description: Schema used by the configuration file

addonName.description: Addon name, should be the same as the Json file holding him

address.description: Address on the automaton address range

controllerId.description: Automaton where this gate is available

address.description: Address on the automaton address range

controllerId.description: Automaton where this gate is available

mapInMax.description: Mapped input max data, from IOController

mapInMin.description: Mapped input min data, from IO Controller

mapOutMax.description: Mapped output max data, to Human

mapOutMin.description: Mapped output min data, to Human

size.description: Size is always a word for this typoe of Gate

address.description: Address on the automaton address range

controllerId.description: Automaton where this gate is available

skeleton.description: Name of the referencing skeleton profile

name.description: Name is only for description purposes, not used

profile.description: Profile UUID used by this premade

maxTarget.description: Max target is the maximum setable value for this regulation

minus.description: Actuators used to reach target when we are over target

plus.description: Actuators used to reach target when we are under target

securityMax.description: Security max is the maximum admissible value from the sensor read, will disable regulation if went over

lifespan.description: Lifespan of the product in days. If lifespan is not defined, do not apply deprecation to this product

callToAction.description: Call to action, For UI Purposes only

APIEndpoint.description: API Endpoint to be reached by the CTA (NusterTurbine Endpoints)

UIEndpoint.description: UIEndpoint reached by the CTA (NusterDesktop Endpoints)

minus.description: Actuators used to reach target when we are over target

plus.description: Actuators used to reach target when we are under target

securityMax.description: Security max is the maximum admissible value from the sensor read, will disable regulation if went over

io.description: IO gate name of this sensor

supportedProductSeries.description: Supported product series. If defined slot is `Productable`

profile.description: Profile UUID used by this premade

ip.description: IP Address on the local network
IP Address on the local network

size.description: Corresponding size of the EX260 (either 16 outputs or 32 outputs)

durationType.description: Duration type of this maintenance task

requireEnableGate.description: Gate needed to check maitnenance task

sensorBaseValue.description: When this value is reached on sensor means that maintenance task has been done

sensorLimitValue.description: When this value is reached on sensor maintenance is due

durationLimit.description: When this duration is reached maitnenance is due

durationType.description: Duration type of this maintenance task

connectPopup.description: Connect popup is triggered when the user logs on for the first time

callToActions.description: Call to actions of this popup.

APIEndpoint.description: API Endpoint to be reached by the CTA (NusterTurbine Endpoints)

UIEndpoint.description: UIEndpoint reached by the CTA (NusterDesktop Endpoints)

message.description: i18n message, body of this popup

title.description: i18n text, title of this pop up

homeInformations.description: Home screen informations, path of the data to be fetched, should only be reactive data such as io or containers

skeleton.description: Name of the referencing skeleton profile

fields.description: Fields definitions contained by this skeleton

name.description: Name of the profile field can be splitted by category using a #. `ex: temperature#target`

unity.description: Unity of the profile field, it used for UI purposes only

value.description: Value contained byt the profile field

blocks.description: Program blocks Array that is executed by this step

crashStepFallback.description: Step to goto on soft end

endBlocks.description: Program Blocks array that are executed at the end of a step

isEnabled.description: Parameter block that indicates if this step is enabled in the PBR flow

runAmount.description: Optional Parameter block that tells the PBR if this steps must be runt multiple times

runConditions.description: Step run conditions, theeses runConditions triggers Soft End Strategy if defined, otherwise, runs hard end strategy

name.description: Name of the run condition, used for reference

startOnly.description: Is the condition only used at start

startBlocks.description: Program Blocks array that are executed at the start of a step

additionalInfo.description: AddtionalInfo is an array of Gate names that are displayed when the cycle is running

name.description: Name of the run condition, used for reference

startOnly.description: Is the condition only used at start

SetVariableProgramBlock.description: **Variable** Will set the *[0] Variable name* to *[1] Variable value*.

SleepProgramBlock.description: **Sleep** Will wait the amount of time supplied.

StopProgramBlock.description: **Stop** Will stop the cycle with the reason supplied.

WhileProgramBlock.description: **While Loop** Runs *blocks* until *[0]* compared to *[2]* by *[1]* is false.
